quote: It's going to happen whether you like it or not,” he said quietly.The top of the book dropped to display Susan's wrinkled gaze. “What's that?”“Change,” Rich said. “It's inevitable.
quote_letters: ITS GOING TO HAPPEN WHETHER YOU LIKE IT OR NOT HE SAID QUIETLYTHE TOP OF THE BOOK DROPPED TO DISPLAY SUSANS WRINKLED GAZE WHATS THATCHANGE RICH SAID ITS INEVITABLE
